verses.verse: And <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Ye <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: Because the <S%H341>enemy<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> against <S%H1889>you<s%>, Aha! <S%H5769>and<s%>, The ancient high <S%H1116>places<s%> are ours in <S%H4181>possession<s%>;

therefore <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H8074>Because<s%>, even because they have made you desolate, and swallowed you <S%H7602>up<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, that ye might be a <S%H4181>possession<s%> unto the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and ye are taken <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of <S%H3956>talkers<s%>, and the evil <S%H1681>report<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>;

therefore <S%H2022><s%>, ye mountains of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and to the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, to the <S%H650>watercourses<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valleys<s%>, to the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H2723>wastes<s%> and to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H5800>forsaken<s%>, which are become a <S%H957>prey<s%> and <S%H3933>derision<s%> to the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%>;

therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: Surely in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%> against the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and against all <S%H123>Edom<s%>, that have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> my <S%H776>land<s%> unto themselves for a <S%H4181>possession<s%> with the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of all their <S%H3824>heart<s%>, with <S%H7589>despite<s%> of <S%H3824>soul<s%>, to cast it <S%H4054>out<s%> for a <S%H957>prey<s%>.

Therefore <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> concerning the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and to the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, to the <S%H650>watercourses<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valleys<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H1696>Behold<s%>, I have spoken in my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> and in my <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, because ye have <S%H5375>borne<s%> the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>:

therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: I <S%H5375>have<s%> <S%H3027>sworn<s%>, <S%H1471>saying<s%>, Surely the nations that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5375>you<s%>, they shall bear their <S%H3639>shame<s%>.

But <S%H2022>ye<s%>, O mountains of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, ye shall shoot <S%H5414>forth<s%> your <S%H6057>branches<s%>, and <S%H5375>yield<s%> your <S%H6529>fruit<s%> to my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for they are at <S%H7126>hand<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%>.
For <S%H6437><s%>, behold, I am for you, and I will turn unto <S%H5647>you<s%>, and ye shall be tilled and <S%H2232>sown<s%>;

and I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> upon <S%H1004>you<s%>, all the house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, even all of <S%H5892>it<s%>; and the cities shall be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>, and the <S%H2723>waste<s%> places shall be <S%H1129>builded<s%>;

and I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> upon you <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%>; and they shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> and be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%>; and I will cause you to be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> after your former <S%H6927>estate<s%>, and will do <S%H2895>better<s%> unto you than at your <S%H7221>beginnings<s%>: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Yea <S%H120><s%>, I will cause men to <S%H3212>walk<s%> upon <S%H5971>you<s%>, even my people <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5159>thee<s%>, and thou shalt be their inheritance, and thou shalt no <S%H3254>more<s%> henceforth bereave them of <S%H7921>children<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: Because they <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H398>you<s%>, Thou land art a devourer of <S%H120>men<s%>, and hast been a <S%H7921>bereaver<s%> of thy <S%H1471>nation<s%>;
therefore thou shalt <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> no <S%H7921>more<s%>, neither bereave thy <S%H1471>nation<s%> any <S%H5002>more<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>;

neither will I let thee <S%H8085>hear<s%> any more the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, neither shalt thou <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> any <S%H1471>more<s%>, neither shalt thou cause thy nation to <S%H3782>stumble<s%> any <S%H5002>more<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, when the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their own <S%H127>land<s%>, they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> it by their <S%H1870>way<s%> and by their <S%H5949>doings<s%>: their <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me was as the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of a woman in her <S%H5079>impurity<s%>.

Wherefore I <S%H8210>poured<s%> out my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon them for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> which they had <S%H8210>poured<s%> out upon the <S%H776>land<s%>, and because they had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> it with their <S%H1544>idols<s%>;

and I <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and they were <S%H2219>dispersed<s%> through the <S%H776>countries<s%>: according to their <S%H1870>way<s%> and according to their <S%H5949>doings<s%> I judged <S%H8199>them<s%>.

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, whither they <S%H935>went<s%>, they <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>; in that men <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H5971>them<s%>, These are the people of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and are gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H776>land<s%>.

But I had <S%H2550>regard<s%> for my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, which the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, whither they <S%H935>went<s%>.

Therefore <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: I <S%H6213>do<s%> not this for your <S%H1004>sake<s%>, O house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, but for my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, which ye have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, whither ye <S%H935>went<s%>.

And I will <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, which hath been <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, which ye have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H1471>them<s%>; and the nations shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when I shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in you before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

For I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you from <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you out of all the <S%H776>countries<s%>, and will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into your own <S%H127>land<s%>.

And I will <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> upon <S%H2891>you<s%>, and ye shall be clean: from all your <S%H2932>filthiness<s%>, and from all your <S%H1544>idols<s%>, will I cleanse <S%H2891>you<s%>.

A <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> also will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2319>you<s%>, and a new <S%H7307>spirit<s%> will I <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H5493>you<s%>; and I will take away the <S%H68>stony<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> out of your <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, and cause you to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, and do <S%H6213>them<s%>.
And ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%>; and ye shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will be your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And I will <S%H3467>save<s%> you from all your <S%H2932>uncleannesses<s%>: and I will <S%H7121>call<s%> for the <S%H1715>grain<s%>, and will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5414>it<s%>, and lay no famine upon <S%H7458>you<s%>.

And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%>, and the <S%H8570>increase<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, that ye may <S%H3947>receive<s%> no more the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

Then shall ye <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and your <S%H4611>doings<s%> that were not <S%H2896>good<s%>; and ye shall <S%H6962>loathe<s%> yourselves in your own <S%H6440>sight<s%> for your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and for your <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

Not for your sake <S%H6213>do<s%> I <S%H5002>this<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>, be it <S%H3045>known<s%> unto <S%H954>you<s%>: be ashamed and <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for your <S%H1870>ways<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> you from all your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, I will cause the <S%H5892>cities<s%> to be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>, and the <S%H2723>waste<s%> places shall be <S%H1129>builded<s%>.
And the <S%H776>land<s%> that was <S%H8074>desolate<s%> shall be <S%H5647>tilled<s%>, whereas it was a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all that passed <S%H5674>by<s%>.

And they shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H1977>This<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> that was <S%H8074>desolate<s%> is become like the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%>; and the <S%H2720>waste<s%> and <S%H8074>desolate<s%> and <S%H2040>ruined<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1219>fortified<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>.

Then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are <S%H7604>left<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, have <S%H1129>builded<s%> the <S%H2040>ruined<s%> <S%H5193>places<s%>, and planted that which was <S%H8074>desolate<s%>: <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>, and I will do it.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: For <S%H1875>this<s%>, moreover, will I be inquired of by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> it for <S%H7235>them<s%>: I will increase them with <S%H120>men<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock<s%>.

As the <S%H6629>flock<s%> for <S%H6944>sacrifice<s%>, as the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in her appointed <S%H4150>feasts<s%>, so shall the <S%H2720>waste<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> be <S%H4392>filled<s%> with <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
